author: cheeky_gorilla
content:
Relevant to the Verkle & Stateless breakout: EthStaker has been recommending 2TB SSDs for at least 6 months already (since before the merge). 

"The Ethereum execution and consensus layer are approaching 1TB in size so a 2TB or bigger drive is recommended."

https://reddit.com/r/ethstaker/comments/rizos9/hardware_for_staking_2022_edition/
https://ethstaker.gitbook.io/ethstaker-knowledge-base/hardware/hardware-requirements
